title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building .NET AI Applications with Semantic Kernel and Amazon Bedrock (DEV302)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Semantic Kernel 和 Amazon Bedrock 构建 .NET AI 应用程序 (DEV302)
abstract: This code-first session demonstrates how to transform .NET applications into powerful AI solutions using Semantic Kernel and Amazon Bedrock. The presentation explores the Semantic Kernel framework and its integration with Amazon Bedrock's AI capabilities, including flexible foundation model selection and multi-turn conversational abilities. Learn how to leverage Amazon Bedrock for extensible tool usage in AI applications. Through practical examples, the session covers techniques for enhancing existing applications and building new AI-powered solutions in .NET, providing developers with actionable skills for AI integration.
abstract_cn: 本次代码实践会议演示了如何使用 Semantic Kernel 和 Amazon Bedrock 将 .NET 应用程序转变为强大的 AI 解决方案。演示探讨了 Semantic Kernel 框架及其与 Amazon Bedrock AI 能力的集成,包括灵活的基础模型选择和多轮对话能力。了解如何利用 Amazon Bedrock 在 AI 应用程序中实现可扩展的工具使用。通过实际示例,本次会议涵盖了增强现有应用程序和构建新的 AI 驱动解决方案的技术,为开发人员提供 AI 集成的可操作技能。
